title: The Parrot and the Cat
description: In this fun little tale from India, we hear about a greedy cat, a kind parrot, a little old lady, a king and his courtiers, and two cunning crabs who all end up in a cat’s tummy. Listen to Tuup telling this lively tale, and find out how they escape.
itunes:title: The Parrot and the Cat
itunes:author: Wardour Studios
